fields.name: I Loosened it! (Passive):
fields.value: Each attack you sustain that doesn’t kill you will instead reduce your defense power by 0.5. This ability will no longer affect you if you have 0.5x or less defense power by any means. Upon reaching that point, all players will be informed by a “Pop!” message or announcement.

fields.name: Dill on the Sill:
fields.value: Target a player. You will visit them, and receive any attacks in their place.

fields.name: Brine (Locked, x1):
fields.value: Unlocked by placing in the top three. Anyone who attacks you during the night this is used will fail to decrease your defense if they don’t kill you. After this point, anyone attacked by them, killed or not, will receive the accompanying message, “Your assailant smelt funny…”
